title: Systems Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Serendipity-Based Educational Design for Digital Archive Exploration

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify serendipitous opportunities during digital archive exploration.
Learners can propose three or more ways to reinterpret serendipitously discovered materials within language education contexts.
Learners can structure their digital archive exploration experiences into a five-stage process through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
